EmailTemplate.name: Signature card Reply
EmailTemplate.subject: Signature card Reply
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Attached to this message is your Signature card, please print and send the signed Signature Card:
1) Mail to: BOFI Federal Bank P.O. Box 509127, San Diego, CA 92150-9948
2) Fax to: 858-350-0443; or
3) Send a secure message via Online Banking with the completed Signature Card attached
We appreciate your business and commit to providing superior Banking products, support and services.
